- Systematic comparison of behavioural repertoires in (complex) protists and (simple) animals
- Ethograms, biophysics
- Machine-learning classification
- vEM of whole cells and bodies
- fast volumetric imaging of calcium and voltage signals across bodies
- standardised learning paradigms
